product_name: Isis Sport Seamless Sports Bra - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Isis Sport Seamless Sports Bra is built for support during high-impact activities. It best fits A-B cups and can accommodate C cups. Racer-back design frees up shoulder movement. Double-layer construction adds support and coverage. Internal shape pockets accommodate pads or prosthetic inserts (not included). Isis Sport Seamless Sports Bra features a knit pattern engineered to wick away moisture and provide support. Closeout.
short_description: The Isis Sport Seamless Sports Bra is built for support during high-impact activities. It best fits A-B cups and can accommodate C cups.
